ingredientList:
2 big ripe avocados, peeled and seed removed
8-ounce package cream cheese
8 ounces sour cream
Pinch garlic salt
1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 cups diced tomatoes
1 1/2 cups shredded lettuce
Optional picante sauce
recipeText:
Mash and mix the avocados, cream cheese, sour cream, and garlic salt until creamy. Spread on a pizza pan.

Top with shredded cheese, diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, and picante sauce.

ingredientList:
2 packages crescent roll dough
8 ounces cream cheese, softened
1/2 ounce ranch salad dressing mix
1/3 cup mayonnaise
1/2 teaspoon dill weed
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1/4 teaspoon garlic salt
Small pieces of cauliflower, broccoli, & carrots
Shredded cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Roll out the dough and bake at 350 degrees for 13 minutes.

Mix the remaining ingredients except cheese and veggies.  Spread cream cheese mix on cooled crust.  

Spread cheese and veggies over the cream cheese mix.  Cut and serve.

ingredientList:

recipeText:
Roll out the dough and bake at 350Â° for 13 minutes.
Mix the remaining ingredients except shredded cheese and veggies. Spread on cooled crust. 
Spread cheese and veggies over the cream cheese mix. 
Cut and serve.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup butter
1/2 cup sugar
2 cups rice crispy treats
1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract
6 1/2 ounces dates chopped
1 cup coconut
recipeText:
Cook the butter, sugar and dates until mushy. Add Rice Krispies and vanilla shape into small balls ( Walnut size or smaller).

Roll in coconut. Do not bake.

Makes about two dozen balls.

ingredientList:
3 cups vinegar
1 cup water
4 cups sugar
1/4 cup salt
1 1/2 teaspoons turmeric
1 1/8 teaspoons mustard seeds
pickles, sliced
onions, sliced
recipeText:
Mix everything together.  

Put in a jar and shake back and forth several times during the day.
 
Keep in the refrigerator.

ingredientList:
3 cups vinegar
1 cup water
4 cups sugar
1/4 cup salt
1 1/2 teaspoons turmeric
1 1/8 teaspoons dry mustard
recipeText: Slice pickles and onions.  Mix all ingredients and put in jars.  Shake back and forth several times during the day.  Keep refrigerated.

ingredientList:
1 gallon large cucumbers rings, about 15 cucumbers
2 cups dehydrated limes
8 1/2 quarts water
1 cup white vinegar
1 tablespoon alum
1 small bottle red food coloring
2 cups vinegar
10 cups sugar
2 cups water
8 cinnamon sticks
1 package red hot candies
recipeText:
Put cucumber rings in lime water and let stand for 24 hours.  

Drain rings and wash in cool water.  Cover with cold water and let stand 3 hours.  

Drain and add 1 cup white vinegar, alum, and small bottle of red food coloring.  Water to cover.  Heat and simmer 2 hours, then drain well and discard liquid.  

Create syrup by bring remaining ingredients to a boil and pour over the rings.  Keep lid on tight and let stand overnight.  

Drain and reheat the syrup for 3 mornings.  The 4th morning, heat rings and syrup to boil.  Pack in sterilized jars and seal.  Makes 4 -5 quarts.

ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 cup evaporated milk
1/2 cup margarine or butter softened
3 eggs beaten
1 1/3 cups flaked coconut
1 cup chopped pecans or almonds
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
In medium saucepan, combine sugar, milk, margarine and eggs. Cook over medium heat until mixture begins to bubble, stirring constantly.

Stir in all remaining ingredients. 

Cool until of desired spreading consistency.

recipeDescription: Prep Time: 15 minutes - Yield: frosts 2-layer or 13 x 9-inch cake
ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 cup evaporated milk
1/2 cup margarine or butter, softened
3 eggs, beaten
1 1/3 cups flaked coconut
1 cup chopped pecans or almonds
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
1. In medium saucepan, combine sugar, milk, margarine and eggs. Cook over medium heat until mixture begins to bubble, stirring constantly.

2. Stir in all remaining ingredients. Cool until of desired spreading consistency.

ingredientList:
1 tube sugar cookie dough (homemade or store bought)
8 ounces cream cheese
1/3 cup sugar
1 cup pineapple tidbits
2 kiwi fruits, peeled and sliced
1 cup strawberries, sliced
1 cup blueberries
recipeText:
Spread sugar cookie dough on pizza pan.  Bake as directed.  Cool crust to room temperature.  

Mix cream cheese with sugar to taste as you wish.  

Right before serving, spread cream cheese mixture over cookie dough crust.  
Top with fruit of your choice.   

For fancy snacks, use digestive biscuits or small sugar cookies instead of making sugar cookie crust on pizza pan.

ingredientList:
1 tube sugar cookie dough (homemade or store bought)
8 ounces cream cheese
1/3 cup sugar
pineapple tidbit
kiwi fruit
strawberries
blueberries
recipeText:
Spread sugar cookie dough on pizza pan. Bake as directed. Cool crust to room temperature. 

Mix cream cheese with sugar to taste as you wish. Right before serving, spread cream cheese mixture over cookie dough crust. 

Top with fruit of your choice. For fancy snacks, use small sugar cookies instead of making crust on pizza pan.

ingredientList:
1 10 3/4-ounce can cream of mushroom soup
1 10 3/4-ounce can cream of chicken soup
3 pounds ground beef
1 pound Mexican cheese
recipeText:
Brown hamburger, drain grease.  

Mix in soups and cheese until cheese is melted and ingredients are hot.

ingredientList:
1 (10 3/4-ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
1 (10 3/4-ounce) can cream of chicken soup
3 pounds ground beef
1 pound Mexican cheese
recipeText: Brown hamburger, drain grease. Mix in soups and cheese until cheese is melted and ingredients are hot.

ingredientList:
1 pound imitation crab meat
1 small onion (you can use purple onions)
1 bottle (small Kraft) ranch salad dressing
1/2 jar Kraft mayonnaise
2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
2 cups shredded Swiss cheese
recipeText: Mix and eat!

ingredientList:
1 pound imitation crab meat
1 small onion (you can use purple onions)
1 bottle (small Kraft) ranch salad dressing
1/2 jar Kraft mayonnaise
2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
2 cups shredded Swiss cheese
recipeText: Mix and eat!

ingredientList:
8 cups well drained tomatoes
2 1/2 cups onions
2 cups green, red, or any sweet peppers
1/2 cup hot jalapeno peppers
6 cloves garlic
2 teaspoons cumin
2 teaspoons pepper
2 tablespoons canning or pickling salt
1/3 cup sugar
1/3 cup vinegar
1 16-ounce can tomato sauce
1 12-ounce can tomato paste
recipeText: Mix all ingredients together.  Boil for 10 - 15 minutes.

ingredientList:
8 cups well drained tomatoes
2 1/2 cups onions
2 cups green and red peppers
1/2 cup jalapeÃ±o peppers
6 gloves garlic
2 teaspoons cumin
2 teaspoons pepper
2 tablespoons canning salt pickling salt

recipeText: Mix all together and boil to thicken.

ingredientList:
1 stick butter
1 cup water
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup flour
4 eggs

Filling:
1 pint heavy cream
1 package 3.4 ounces instant vanilla pudding
1/3 cup milk
recipeText:
Bring water, butter, and vanilla to a boil add flour. Stir constantly until it leaves the side of the pot and forms a ball.

Remove and let cool.

Beat the eggs, one at a time until smooth. Drop by Tablespoon onto parchment lines cookie sheets. 

Makes 8 makes large ones.

Bake at 400 degrees for about 40 minutes.

Pro tip: Poke them with a toothpick once out of the oven, then return them to the oven with it shut off and the door cracked to let them cool; this prevents them from deflating.

Let Cool.

Beat cream and pudding in mixer until thick.

Slice in half and pipe or scoop in filling.

Dust with powder sugar at pour on melted chocolate.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup shortening
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 cup water
1 cup flour
4 eggs
Heavy cream
recipeText:
Bring shortening and water to a boil.  Stir in sifted flour and salt slowly.  Beat constantly until mixture leaves sides of pan and form into a ball (about 4 minutes).

Remove from heat and cool.  Add 4 eggs, one at a time, beating until smooth after each egg addition.  

Drop spoonfuls onto greased baking sheet.

Bake at 400 degrees for 45 - 50 minutes. 

Cool and fill with whipped cream.  Can also use ice cream or sweetened fruit. 

Makes 12 cream puffs.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup shortening
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 cup water
1 cup flour
4 eggs
recipeText:
Bring Shortening and water to a boil.  Stir in sifted flour and salt. Quickly beat constantly until mixture leaves the side of pan and farm into a ball, about 4 minutes.

Remove from heat and cool. Then add 4 eggs, on-at-a-time, beating until smooth with each addition.

Drop onto greased baking sheet.

Bake at 400 degrees for 45 to 50 minutes.

Cool and fill with whipped cream or sweet fruit

Yields 12 big cream puffs. Can make small ones (bake for about 25 minutes).

ingredientList:
1 pound Jimmy Dean Hot Sausage, brown and drain
9 eggs, beaten
3 cups milk
4 slices bread, cubed
1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 teaspoons dry mustard
1 teaspoon salt
2 teaspoons dried minced onion
recipeText:
Put browned sausage in the bottom of a 9"x13" pan.  Sprinkle with cheese and onion flakes.  Cover with bread.
In a separate bowl, mix egg , milk, mustard, and salt.  Pour mixture over the bread.

Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes.
